text: You have reclaimed sacred Arabyan ground, the people rejoice and flock to join your armies.
These mighty warriors have reclaimed sacred Arabyan land, they are lauded as heroes and blessed by the Djinns.
This region is sacred to Arabyans!
You have claimed this land in Tutankhanut's name, this pleases him.
Grand Bombards stand ready to lay ruin on enemy walls.
Araby holds ancient bonds and hatreds though they have mellowed with time.
The Scythans were once a nomadic people but now serve and defend the deserts of the Tomb Kings to the east.
Jaffar has reclaimed the throne of Al Haikk and ushered in a new age of magic and trade. His enemies shall tremble!
Led by the seafaring Golden Magus, these veteran sailors have been far and wide in search of gold and glory
Allows the [[img:icon_pirate_crew]][[/img]]pirate crew to construct ship buildings and recruit units directly to the vessel.
Sets up a defensive camp, enabling shipbuilding, recruitment and replenishment regardless of territory.
Increases the favourability of the Winds of Magic when fighting battles and solve Treasure Maps by digging for treasure at the locations hinted at in the riddles.
Hot-blooded tempers paired with steadfast loyalty can go a long way.
Once a fur-clad savage, always a fur-clad savage. It takes little to break a manâ€™s will, and even less to confine him.
